devdoc.details: This pool uses oracle-based pricing instead of AMM math.      Uses NATIVE MNT (msg.value) instead of ERC20 MNT for simplicity.      Key characteristics:      - Each pool handles one basket token paired with native MNT      - Swaps are priced using BasketOracle.getBasketPrice()      - No slippage from pool ratio changes (oracle-priced)      - Liquidity providers deposit both native MNT and basket tokens

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

addLiquidity(uint256).details: Send native MNT via msg.value, basket tokens via approval

params.amountBasket: Amount of basket tokens to deposit

params._basketId: The basket ID this pool trades

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.amountBasketIn: Amount of basket tokens to sell

params.sharesToBurn: Amount of LP shares to burn

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amountBasketIn: Amount of basket tokens to sell

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BasketLiquidityPool

FeesCollected(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when fees are collected by owner

basketTokenBalance().notice: Basket token balance in the pool

getOracleBasketPrice().notice: Get the current basket price from oracle

getOracleMntPrice().notice: Get the current MNT price from oracle

lpShares(address).notice: Liquidity provider shares: address => share amount

mntBalance().notice: MNT balance in the pool (native MNT)

previewSwapBasketForMnt(uint256).notice: Preview swap basket tokens for MNT

previewSwapMntForBasket(uint256).notice: Preview swap MNT for basket tokens

swapBasketForMnt(uint256).notice: Swap basket tokens for native MNT using oracle price

swapMntForBasket().notice: Swap native MNT for basket tokens using oracle price

userdoc.notice: Liquidity pool for trading NATIVE MNT  BasketToken pairs
